title: Meet Fifty Shades Continued - Fifty Shades Freed
description: Converted to ebook format, Cover UpdatedFifty Shades Freed from Christian's POVGet inside Christian Grey's mind, as you read the complete Fifty Shades trilogy retold from his point of view, carrying on where E L James left off at the end of 'Fifty Shades.
author: G.E.  Griffin
